project_plan.name: Python-based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Develop a Python-based multiple-choice quiz game that will ask users questions, keep track of their scores, and display the results at the end.

task.name: Implement the main game loop that asks questions
Create a variable to store questions and answers
Implement score tracking for the player
Implement a function to display the final score
Write tests for each of the game functions implemented above
Execute tests on the quiz game to ensure that all features work correctly
